TopicTitle: Why does every profile view of my profile I do count as new one?

Articles.Content: Wouldn't it be better if you could only have 1 view from yourself? I just discovered that I have 80 profile views but I suspect at least 60 of them are from me

Not sure how exactly it is counted but I have 1,894 profile views  (signed up in 2014 for reference) 

Perhaps people look at profiles significantly more frequently that we thought?

Edited February 13, 2017 by Slam_Jones
I often accidentally hit people's profile. I am on mobile 99.999999999% of the time.
I just inflated your profile views more.  You're at 113 now.
